title: mangaLa nAma sankIrtanam
sahitya:
mangaLa nAma sankIrtanam sheiguvOm mAniDarE vArIr


anupallavi

  shankara sAmba sadAshiva nAraNa shambhu janArdana jayahari hariyenrE


caraNam    Om gaNapati guha Om sharavaNabhava Om shakti vANi kalyANi mahAlakSmi
Om shuddha sadguru Om saccidAnanda Om paripUraNa parama pitAvenrE
